name: f6f2e571-8de4-4746-adc4-2e539f10a809
description:
Webhook "prebuilt_components_authentication:security_answers" returns 3 response parameters:
1) $flow.security_card_number, 2) $flow.security_last_trans_amount, 3) $flow.last_payment_mode
If Ans is correct, we are using "$sys.func.ADD($flow.secure_ans_count, 1)"
